flavorText: Fragile, floating Skysail suddenly seemed like an appealingly safe place to live.

foreignData.flavorText: Die fragile, schwebende Himmelstadt erschien plötzlich wie ein attraktiver sicherer Ort zum Leben.
foreignData.name: Flammenflut
foreignData.text: Die Flammenflut fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu. Überschüssiger Schaden wird stattdessen dem Beherrscher der Kreatur zugefügt.

foreignData.flavorText: Puertoaéreo, frágil y flotante, de repente parecía un lugar atractivo para vivir.
foreignData.name: Verter fuego
foreignData.text: Verter fuego hace 4 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo. El daño sobrante se hace al controlador de esa criatura en vez de eso.

foreignData.flavorText: La fragile ville volante de Vogueciel eut soudain l'air d'un lieu où l'on peut vivre en toute sécurité.
foreignData.name: Déversement de flammes
foreignData.text: Le Déversement de flammes inflige 4 blessures à une créature ciblée. Le surplus de blessures est infligée au contrôleur de cette créature à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: La fragile Solcanembi fluttuante d'improvviso sembrò un luogo incredibilmente sicuro in cui vivere.
foreignData.name: Fuoriuscita di Fiamme
foreignData.text: La Fuoriuscita di Fiamme infligge 4 danni a una creatura bersaglio. Il danno in eccesso viene invece inflitto al controllore di quella creatura.

foreignData.flavorText: 空に浮かぶ脆いスカイセイルが、突如としてどこよりも安全な場所のように思えた。
foreignData.name: 炎の氾濫
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。炎の氾濫はそれに４点のダメージを与える。余剰のダメージは、代わりにそのクリーチャーのコントローラーに与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 연약하게 떠 있는 창공돛이 갑자기 매력적이고 안전한 살 곳처럼 보였다.
foreignData.name: 불길 흘리기
foreignData.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 불길 흘리기는 그 생물에게 피해 4점을 입힌다. 여분의 피해는 대신 그 생물의 조종자에게 입혀진다.

foreignData.flavorText: De repente, a frágil e flutuante Vela Celeste pareceu um lugar atraente e seguro para se viver.
foreignData.name: Vazamento de Chamas
foreignData.text: Vazamento de Chamas causa 4 pontos de dano à criatura alvo. O dano excedente será causado, em vez disso, ao controlador daquela criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: Хрупкий, парящий в вышине Небесный Парус показался вдруг удивительно безопасным для жизни местом.
foreignData.name: Расплескавшееся Пламя
foreignData.text: Расплескавшееся Пламя наносит 4 повреждения целевому существу. Избыточные повреждения вместо этого наносятся контролирующему то существо игроку.

foreignData.flavorText: 脆弱飘摇的翔空城突然间像是个安全宜居的福地。
foreignData.name: 烈焰如注
foreignData.text: 烈焰如注对目标生物造成4点伤害。过量伤害改为对该生物的操控者造成之。

foreignData.flavorText: 脆弱飄搖的翔空城突然間像是個安全宜居的福地。
foreignData.name: 烈焰如注
foreignData.text: 烈焰如注對目標生物造成4點傷害。過量傷害改為對該生物的操控者造成之。

name: Flame Spill
originalText: Flame Spill deals 4 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.

rulings.text: Excess damage caused by a spell or ability is similar to how combat damage from a creature with trample is handled. Start with the amount of damage being dealt to the creature and determine what is “lethal.” This is the creature’s toughness minus the amount of damage that it already has marked on it, but ignoring any replacement or prevention effects that will modify this damage. Also ignore whether the creature has an ability such as indestructible that will result in it not being destroyed by this damage.
Once you’ve determined how much damage is excess, Flame Spill simultaneously deals damage to the creature and to its controller. This damage may be modified by replacement or prevention effects.
If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Flame Spill tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve. It won’t deal damage to any player.

text: Flame Spill deals 4 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
